item.title: CVE-2021-24578|2024-08-03T19:35:20.197Z -- unknown -- sportspress%20%E2%80%93%20sports%20club%20%26%20league%20manager
item.description: The SportsPress WordPress plugin before 2.7.9 does not sanitise and escape its match_day parameter before outputting back in the Events backend page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
